name: Giftbringer's Flanged Mace

name: Guaranteed Weapon Unlock
description:
Consuming this will unlock one random weapon skin in your wardrobe that you do not already have.
<c=@flavor>"Skritt will collect just about everything at least once." —Priory Notes on Primitive Races, page 422</c>

name: Moto's Unstable Bauble Infusion: Red
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. Infuses armor with a Super aura.

name: Obsidian Weapon Box
description: Contains a choice of Obsidian weapons.
